description: Attaches the specified managed policy to the specified IAM group.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1098.003 - Account Manipulation: Additional Cloud Roles

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By attaching a policy to a group, an adversary can ensure that even if certain accounts are revoked, the group as a whole still retains the permissions.

incidents.description: Tales from the cloud trenches: The Attacker doth persist too much, methinks

securityImplications: Attackers might use AttachGroupPolicy to assign malicious policies to a group, escalating privileges or enabling unauthorized access.
